name: The Dübener Collection
description:
The "Dübener Collection" combines classical and modern sausage art under one roof.

In four halls built by Walter Gropius in the Bauhaus style, everything that is internationally renowned is shown in numerous special shows.

We show you works by renowned artists such as Dürer, Rembrand, Vermeer, Rubens, van Gogh, Monet, Chagall, Marc, Delacroix, Matisse, Macke, Toulouse-Lautrec, Turner, Picasso, Gurski, Landbloom and many others who have worked on the themes of sausage, cowboys and flamingos.
